entry.title: Acre (settlement) — [ Not Available ]
entry.summary: An ancient port on the coast of Phoenice, and the last Crusader foothold in the Levant.
entry.author: Thomas A. Carlson
David A. Michelson

entry.title: Adana (settlement) — ܐܛܢܗ
entry.summary: A city on the Seyhan River in south-eastern Anatolia, near the Mediterranean coast.
entry.author: Thomas A. Carlson
David A. Michelson

entry.title: Adharbayjān (region) — ܐܕܪܒܝܓܐܢ
entry.summary: A region west of the Caspian Sea, encompassing the modern country of Azerbaijan and the provinces of northwest Iran.

David A. Michelson

entry.title: Aegeae (settlement) — [ Not Available ]
entry.summary: An ancient and medieval port on the coast of Cilicia.

David A. Michelson

entry.title: Aegyptus (province) — ܡܨܪܝܢ
entry.summary: The Roman province of Egypt
entry.author: Thomas A. Carlson
David A. Michelson

entry.title: Akhlat (settlement) — ܟܠܐܛ
entry.summary: A town on the northwestern coast of Lake Van in eastern Anatolia.

David A. Michelson

entry.summary: A major city in northern Syria.

David A. Michelson

entry.title: Amman (settlement) — [ Not Available ]

David A. Michelson

entry.title: Arabia (province) — [ Not Available ]
entry.summary: A Roman province including the Sinai peninsula and Roman territory east of the Jordan River.

David A. Michelson

entry.summary: A Hellenistic city near Apamea, now called al-Rastan.

David A. Michelson

entry.title: Arsanias (river) — [ Not Available ]

David A. Michelson

David A. Michelson

David A. Michelson

David A. Michelson

David A. Michelson

entry.title: Bostra (settlement) — ܒܘܨܪ
entry.summary: A city east of the Jordan River in the Roman province of Arabia.

David A. Michelson

David A. Michelson

David A. Michelson
